lines: So I have seen these lists of creative CV ideas floating around (http://on.mash.to/OfuOeO, http://bit.ly/1hzbZAi), and I could not really think of any ideas for my own. Everything I seemed to think of was just a plain old page that would essentially be the paper version in a browser.

I then thought about what I use everyday. What are the tools that make my job easier? What could I not really do with out? Obviously the answer was easy, the console. We developers use it for pretty much anything, from something as simple as making folder to running builds on projects.
And so the ConsoleCV was born...
